name: Super Benji Genesis
description:
Super Benji Genesis is a Super Benji game intended to be his first adventure - the adventure where he got his cape. The game has eight levels, a boss fight, and lots of fun and adventure that is worth the money you're paying for it.

Please pay extra if you like our work.

The game uses an engine made by @griffpatch (on Scratch), which is free to use. Minor changes were made to the engine to suit the needs of the creators. Some sounds are also from this engine. (The engine is under the CC BY-SA 2.0 license.)
